meanings.definition: Not browned or cooked to a brown color.
meanings.sent1: The unbrowned toast was still soft and pale.
meanings.sent2: The unbrowned chicken needed more time in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The unbrowned cookies looked like they forgot to put on their tan.
meanings.sent4: The unbrowned pie crust was like a blank canvas waiting for flavor.
meanings.sent5: The unbrowned bread crust was as white as snow, untouched by heat.

meanings.definition: Not having browned or become brown.
meanings.sent1: The unbrowned apples were crisp and fresh.
meanings.sent2: The unbrowned leaves still clung to the tree in early autumn.
meanings.sent3: The unbrowned banana peel was a rare sight in the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The unbrowned grass in the yard looked like a sea of green waves.
meanings.sent5: The unbrowned steak was a reminder of the chef's careful timing.
